b:switch.b:if: Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates!¡Suscríbase a nuestra lista de correo para recibir las nuevas actualizaciones!Inscreva-se em nossa lista de e-mails para receber as novas atualizações!
That is AllEso es TodoIsso é Tudo

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", postAuthor: , authorLabel: "", postDate: , dateLabel: "" }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.isSearch and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:allBylineItems.labels or data:allBylineItems.share or data:post.author.aboutMe or data:allBylineItems.backlinks
b:tag.name: div

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: { noThumbnail: "https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eALXtf-Ljts/WrQYAbzcPUI/AAAAAAAABjY/vptx-N2H46oFbiCqbSe2JgVSlHhyl0MwQCK4BGAYYCw/s72-c/nth-ify.png", relatedPostsNum: "3", cookieExpiresDays: "7", followByEmailText: "Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates!", commentsSystem: "blogger", disqusShortname: "templateify-comments", dateFormat: "{m} {d}, {y}", months: { jan: "January", feb: "February", mar: "March", apr: "April", may: "May", jun: "June", jul: "July", aug: "August", sep: "September", oct: "October", nov: "November", dec: "December" } }

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.isSearch and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:allBylineItems.labels or data:allBylineItems.share or data:post.author.aboutMe or data:allBylineItems.backlinks
b:tag.name: div
